title: Psie Przedszkole - Website
summary: Website for a dog training school with admin panel. Next.js frontend + C# API backend.
content:
## Overview

Website rebuild for psie-przedszkole.pl - a dog training school in Warsaw/Zielonka area. Monorepo with Next.js frontend and C# API backend.

## Features

### Public Website

- Homepage with service offerings
- Service subpages (puppy school, consultations, home visits)
- Blog with MDX articles
- Photo gallery
- Client testimonials
- Contact form

### Admin Panel

- JWT authorization
- CRUD for blog posts
- Service and pricing management
- Gallery upload and management
- WYSIWYG editor (Tiptap) with MDX export

## Architecture

### Frontend (Next.js 14)

- App Router with Server Components
- SSR without cache - changes visible immediately
- Tailwind CSS
- Contentlayer for MDX
- TypeScript

### Backend (ASP.NET Core)

- Minimal API
- JWT authentication
- JSON file storage (no database)
- MailKit for contact form
- BCrypt password hashing

### Infrastructure

- Docker + docker-compose
- Traefik reverse proxy
- Shared volumes for content and uploads

## Challenges

- WordPress migration while preserving SEO (301 redirects)
- Role system (user/mod/admin) without database
- Real-time WYSIWYG editor preview
- Gallery image optimization
